protein.specific_function: Hydrolysis of (1->4)-beta-linkages between N- acetylmuramic acid and N-acetyl-D-glucosamine residues in a peptidoglycan and between N-acetyl-D-glucosamine residues in chitodextrins

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on glycosyl bonds

reference.reference_text: Zhang K, Gao R, Zhang H, Cai X, Shen C, Wu C, Zhao S, Yu L: Molecular cloning and characterization of three novel lysozyme-like genes, predominantly expressed in the male reproductive system of humans, belonging to the c-type lysozyme/alpha-lactalbumin family. Biol Reprod. 2005 Nov;73(5):1064-71. Epub 2005 Jul 13.
